documentation.author: Cerner Model
documentation.purpose: Ensures there is an active PSO order on the patient's chart, which is cosigned if applicable, before the Discharge Patient order is placed. Ensures that documentation is captured to support stays under two midnights, if applicable.
documentation.explanation:
If PSO order has not been places but not cosigned, alert fires and phone message is sent to Message Center.
If a discharge order is placed but a PSO order is not found on the patient's chart, alert fires.
If patient has a PSO order, is on Medicare, and has been in the hospital under 24 hours, alert fires to document reason for discharge under two midnights.
documentation.impact:
The Following templates require reinstantiation to localize content at client sites:
L5 - DETAIL_VALUE should be populated with local values for financial class that signify Medicare
L6 - Inside the parenthesis, all applicable code_values for Medicare insurance on codeset 354 should be added and separated by commas
L14 - POSITION should be populated with Physician positions who will be alerted to certify or cosign before discharge can be ordered
L15 - POSITION should be populated with Non-Physician positions who will not be allowed to order Discharge

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC and OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_DETAIL_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALERT_FLEX_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send alert OPT_TITLE stating TXT, OPT_CANCEL_LABEL, OPT_IGNORE_LABEL, OPT_OVERRIDE_REASON, OPT_MODIFY_LABEL, OPT_DEFAULT_LABEL, OPT_ORDERS, OPT_DEFAULT_FIRST_ORDER, OPT_URL_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_URL_ADDRESS, OK_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORM, OPT_FORM_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORCE_FORM, OPT_LINK

statements.statement: select distinct Form_Definition = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.definition else "*NONE" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.dcp_forms_ref_id else 0.0 endif, Description = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.description else "NONE" endif from dcp_forms_ref dfr, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan dfr where dfr.active_ind = 1 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 join t order Form_Definition

column.value: PowerPorm must be opened, dismiss Alert
PowerForm must be signed, dismiss Alert

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_INBOX_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send a MSG_TYPE related to PATIENT to the In-Box of RECIPIENT with SUBJECT and MSG with MSG_PRIORITY.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_ACTION_A
templateDefinitions.definition: STOP execution of subsequent action groups.
templateDefinitions.description: Stop execution of subsequent action groups

value.value: SELECT HP.ACTIVE_IND FROM ENCNTR_PLAN_RELTN E, HEALTH_PLAN HP PLAN E WHERE E.ENCNTR_ID = @ENCOUNTERID:{Discharge Order} JOIN HP WHERE E.HEALTH_PLAN_ID = HP.HEALTH_PLAN_ID AND HP.FINANCIAL_CLASS_CD IN (634778.00,634777.00,634776.00)@NEWLINEDETAIL log_misc1 = "FOUND" go

values.value: PSO Admit to Inpatient Behavioral Health
PSO Admit to Inpatient GIP Hospice

value.value: select o.need_doctor_cosign_ind, o.need_physician_validate_ind from orders o plan o where o.order_id = @ORDERID:{PSO Order}:1 and (o.need_doctor_cosign_ind = 1 OR o.need_physician_validate_ind = 1)@NEWLINEdetail@NEWLINE log_misc1 = "NEED_COSIGN"@NEWLINEwith nocounter go
Patient Status Order has not been signed

@PATIENT:{Discharge Order} has a patient status order that has not been properly co-signed. Please notify the attending that the patient status order needs to be cosigned. @NEWLINE@NEWLINEThe discharge order will be cancelled.
Co-Signature needed on Patient Status Order
Please cosign the Patient Status Order so @PATIENT:{Discharge Order} can be discharged.
Patient Status Order has not been placed

You are trying to discharge @PATIENT:{Discharge Order} without a patient status order placed. Please place the correct patient status order below before discharging the patient. @NEWLINE@NEWLINEThe discharge order will be cancelled.

values.value: * No Valid Order Sentence Found and Use the Mnemonic..... -> PSO Outpatient in a Bed

value.value: You are trying to discharge @PATIENT:{Discharge Order} before 24 hours has elapsed. Please document your indications by clicking the form below. @NEWLINE
Patient Status Order has not been placed

You are trying to discharge @PATIENT:{Discharge Order} without a patient status order placed. Please contact the physician to place a Patient Status order prior to ordering Discharge.@NEWLINE@NEWLINEThe discharge order will be cancelled.
